Extbase\Persistence

Class Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Typo3QuerySettings

All Implemented Interfaces:

Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Typo3QuerySettingsInterface
public class Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Typo3QuerySettings
implements Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Typo3QuerySettingsInterface

Query settings. This class is NOT part of the FLOW3 API.
It reflects the settings unique to TYPO3 4.x.

Package: Extbase
Subpackage: Persistence
Version: $Id: QueryInterface.php 658 2009-05-16 13:54:16Z jocrau $

Method Summary

  setRespectStoragePage(mixed $respectStoragePage)
  setRespectEnableFields(mixed $respectEnableFields)

Method Detail

setRespectStoragePage

public  setRespectStoragePage(mixed $respectStoragePage)

Sets the flag if the storage page should be respected for the query.

Description Copied From interface:

Sets the flag if the storage page should be respected for the query.

Specified By

setRespectStoragePage in Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Typo3QuerySettingsInterface

Parameters

$respectStoragePage - TRUE the storage page ID will be determined and the statement will be extended accordingly.

setRespectEnableFields

public  setRespectEnableFields(mixed $respectEnableFields)

Sets the flag if the visibility in the frontend should be respected.

Description Copied From interface:

Sets the flag if the visibility in the frontend should be respected.

Specified By

setRespectEnableFields in Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Typo3QuerySettingsInterface

Parameters

$respectEnableFields - if the visibility in the frontend should be respected. If TRUE, the "enable fields" of TYPO3 will be added to the query statement.
